summary: Welcome to Macromancy 4 Reborn. This mod adds magic that lets you alter size of things.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=6][color=#00ff00]Macro[/color][color=#ff0000]mancy[/color] [color=#ffff00]4: [/color][color=#0000ff]Reborn
[/color][/size][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83946/83946-1514480831-2017207658.png[/img]
[size=4]Special Thank LoneNorseman for the Cover Image![/size][/center]Macromancy is a mod featuring size-changing magic. It was originally created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1685565/?][color=#1e84cc]harbinger86[/color][/url] and then [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1277068/?][color=#1e84cc]Vanax8991[/color][/url] improved upon it. Then [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/18052009][color=#1e84cc]Revylrie[/color][/url] continued with the [color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71932/?]previous version[/url] [/color]of this mod, but now he's moved to SE, so he was no longer working on it. Due to the fact that he gave permission to people to do whatever they wanted to with it without asking for permission, I then decided to continue on it. Then [color=#00ffff]Vanex [/color][color=#616161] [/color][color=#d8d8d8]finally released Verion 1.0 of [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27505/?][color=#1e84cc]Macromancy 2[/color][/url], which redid the framework of Macromancy. So then I tried to incoperate the new framework into my mod. As a result, my mod broke. So now here's a revamp of Macromancy 4. Introducing Macromancy 4 Reborn! I have rebuilt this mod from the ground up. So enjoy![color=#ffff00] :)[/color]
[size=4]
SE Version [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15081?tab=description]here[/url]﻿. Give Kudos to Valeryanm guys, he deserves them. [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][u][color=#ffffff]Features[/color][/u]
[list]
[*][size=2]EVERYTHING now Scales.[/size]
[*][size=2]A potion for Restore Size.[/size]
[*][size=2]A unique Macromancy sword.[/size]
[*][size=2]Made the Absorb Size spells blue.[/size]
[*][size=2]Added new Unique Menu Display Objects for the Grow spells, absorb size spells, and restore size spells.[/size]
[*][size=2]I've added a new script to the smmSpell script that lets it [/size][b][size=3]scale the 3rd person camera[/size][/b][size=2]. Yep you read that right. Lavidren, thanks.[/size]
[*][size=2]Lore! Well sort of. [/size]
[*][size=2]Elara Malene: The merchant/trainer. She's a Breton. You'll find her at the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold she has the items the mod adds, as well as some miscellaneous mage stuff.[/size]
[*][size=2]Growth spells, shrinking spells, and more![/size]
[*][size=2]A Brand New SkyUI MCM.[/size]
[*][size=2]Some spells have staves and scrolls to go with them.[/size]
[*][size=2]A lot of the stuff were added to the leveled lists.[/size]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=4][u][color=#ffffff]The Spells[/color][/u][/size][color=#ffffff]
[/color]
[b][u][color=#ff0000][size=3]Shrink Spells:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[list]
[*][size=2][color=#ff0000][b]Shrink:[/b][/color] Apprentice Spell. Causes the caster to dwindle in size.[/size]
[*][size=2][color=#ff0000][b]Shrink Other:[/b][/color]  Apprentice Spell. Causes the target to dwindle in size.[/size]
[/list]
[color=#0000ff][size=3][u][b]Size Absorbing Spells:[/b][/u][/size][/color][list]
[*][size=2][color=#0000ff][b]Absorb Size:[/b][/color][color=#ff0000] [/color]Apprentice Spell. Causes the target to shrink, transferring their size to the caster.to [/size]
[*][size=2][b][color=#0000ff]Mass Absorb Size[/color][color=#ff0000]:[/color][/b] Adapt Spell. Drains size from all targets in the area of impact.[/size]
[*][size=2][color=#0000ff][b]Greater Absorb Size:[/b][/color] Adapt Spell. Drains size from a target. (Will be tweaked to expert level.)[/size]
[/list]
[color=#00ff00][size=3][u][b]Growth Spells:[/b][/u][/size][/color][list]
[*][size=2][color=#00ff00][b]Give Size:[/b][/color] Apprentice Spell. Causes the target to grow at the expense of the caster's maximum size. [color=#000000]Requires a maximum size value greater than 1.[/color][/size]
[*][size=2][color=#00ff00][b]Grow:[/b][/color] Apprentice Spell. Causes the caster to increase in height, provided they are currently smaller than their maximum size.[/size]
[*][size=2][b][color=#00ff00]Grow Other:[/color][/b] Apprentice Spell. [/size]Causes the target to increase in height, provided they are currently smaller than their maximum size.
[/list][size=2]
[/size][b][u][color=#ffff00][size=3]Size Restoration Spells:[/size][/color][/u][/b][list]
[*][size=2][color=#ffff00][b]Restore Size:[/b][/color] Apprentice Spell. Returns the caster to their normal height.[/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=2][color=#ffff00][b]Restore Size Other:[/b] [/color]Apprentice Spell. Returns the target to their normal height.[/size]
[*][size=2][color=#ffff00][b]Mass Restore Size:[/b][/color] Adapt Spell. Returns targets in a area to there normal height.[/size]
[/list][color=#ff7700][u][b]
[size=3]Powers:[/size][/b][/u][/color][list]
[*][color=#ff7700][b]Consume Size:[/b][/color][color=#1e84cc] [/color]Lesser Power. Converts the caster's maximum size into extra health, magicka, and stamina. [color=#000000]This power does not have a spell tome.[/color]
[/list][color=#000000][size=2]
[/size][/color][u][b][color=#1e84cc][size=3]Items:[/size][/color][/b][/u][size=2]
[list]
[*]Potions of Restore Size 
[*]Staffs
[*]Scrolls
[*]Sword of Macromancy
[*]A Study of Scale (Lore)
[*]Size and Scale (Lore)
[/list]
[/size][u]Requirements[/u][list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=2]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE): [color=#000000]You [u]Must[/u] have this installed. Otherwise the mod won't work.[/color][/size]
[*][size=2]SkyUI: If you want to see the mod's MCM menu.[/size]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][color=#980000][size=4][u]Installing and Uninstalling[/u][/size][/color]

[size=2]Installing is easy, just put the esp along with the Textures , Meshes, and Scripts folders into your Data Folder. when it asks if you want to copy the stuff click "Yes to all"

[/size]Uninstalling is a bit harder, delete the esp, then go and delete the scripts that start with vmm, then go delete face gen data the mod adds.

[u][color=#980000][size=4]Compatibility

[/size][/color][/u][color=#980000][size=4][u]Recommended[/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?]PC Head Tracking and Voice Type[/url] - The headtracking works with Macromancy 4 not sure about the Reborn version.

[color=#00ff00][size=3][u]Fully Compatible
[/u][/size][/color]
Pretty much everything. (There are exceptions below.)

[color=#ffff00][size=3][u]Somewhat Compatible[/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59621/?]Macromancy Revamp[/url] - Like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71932/]Macromancy 3[/url], it's also based off [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27505/?]Macromancy 2[/url], It adds additional size changing effects. It's functional, but buggy if used alongside this mod.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] - the Racemenupluging.esp has a feature that lets you scale the character's height using setnodescale. This mod will override that feature.

[size=3][u][color=#cc0000]Not Compatible[/color][/u]
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71932/?]Macromancy 3[/url] - this is because Macromancy 3 is the previous version of the mod.
Any mod that regularly changes the Fame and Infamy values.

[color=#980000][size=4][u]Bugs[/u][/size][/color]
Elara has no dialogue. Not sure why.

[u][color=#980000][size=4]Version History[/size][/color][/u]
Version 1.1
- Readded "A Study of Scale"
- Fixed "Restore Size Other"
- Added New Lore Book: "Size and Scale"
- Name Tweaks
- Fixed Elara.
- New MDO for Shrink.
- Fixed
- Readded Mass Restore Size.
- Fixed the sword enchantment
- Added a 3rd person camera fix into the framework. ;)

1.0- Re-added spell books.- Recreated Elara Malene. (the Merchent.)
- Readded Mass Absorb Size, Greater Absorb Size, and Mass Restore Size.- Readded the Staffs, and Scrolls
- Readded the MCM
.- Added Shrink Other and Grow Other.
- Added the Sword of Macromancy.
- Added Potions of Restore Size.
- New Menu Display Object for Grow.
- New Menu Display Object for Absorb Size.
- New Menu Display Object for Restore Size.
- Added a 3rd person camera fix into the framework. ;)
[color=#980000][size=4][b](Old)
[/b][/size][/color]4.1
- New Spell: Store Size.
- New lore book: "Alteration and the Properties of Macromancy."
- Created a new NPC. Didn't had him to the world. (The reason why is that he's part of something I'm planning for a future update.)

4.0
- Script update for Restore Size. 
- Mass Restore Size: Adept-level spell. Restores all actors within the blast radius to their normal size. (Fire and Forget)- Greater Absorb Size: Adept-level spell. A slightly more powerful version of Mass Absorb Size. Except It only affects a single target. (Fire and Forget)
- New lore book: "A Study of Scale"
-  Merchant Revamp: Elara Malene - Female Brenton Mage who wares Ebony Armor
.-  2 new Staffs, 2 new Scrolls, and 2 new Spell Tomes: Staff of Mass Restore Size,Staff of Greater Absorb Size, Scroll of Mass Restore Size,Scroll of Greater Absorb Size, Spell Tome: Mass Restore Size, Spell Tome: Greater Absorb Size.
- MCM Edit: Edited to say Macomancy 4.
